author: rsitze
msg: Build was looping over target compile.
Shouldn't break (tests execute) anything, since a standalone build/run should do

author: seibert
msg: This should correct the (../..) problems when building

author: rsitze
msg: More properties for jar files, reorder that might(might not) make more sense.

author: gdaniels
msg: Don't die when a non-fatal WSDD exception (such as a bad type mapping)
occurs.  Instead, just log the error and continue without deploying the
bad typemapping, or any service which uses such a typemapping.

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix subtle bug with capitalization of certain bean fields.
A field/xml element named "fOO" will turn into getter/setter methods
"getFOO()/setFOO()".  So when the Introspector looks at that bean, the
property name will be "FOO", not "fOO" due to the rules in the
JavaBeans spec.  Make sure we correctly record that as the "fieldName"
